issue.title: www.bilibili.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://www.bilibili.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.bilibili.com) ### Comment Username: @xiao9jun > 在Bilibili新版页面中，开始几次刷新会在红圈处投放创作推广广告，但是点进去会被uBlock插件拦截，过多的刷新过后推送次数明显减少或者不推送。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/nLJdz61.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v1.44.4 Browser: | Edge Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base Other extensions used: | 无
